content: Where can I view the details of a completed visit?
You can view the details of a completed visit by accessing the 'Visit Report' section in the portal under the 'Completed Visits' tab.
How do I access the Mark visit report?
To access the Mark visit report, log in to the rewards portal and navigate to: MIS Report >> Mark Visit >> Visit Report.
Can I export the Mark visit details?
Yes, you can export the Mark visit details from the portal by selecting the 'Export' option in the 'Consolidated Mark Visit Summary' section.
How can I filter the Mark visit report?
You can filter the Mark visit report by date, customer, or visit status using the available filter options in the report section.
Is there a way to view failed mark visits?
Yes, failed mark visits can be viewed in the 'Failed Visit Report' section in the portal under the 'Mark Visit' menu.
Where can I find the visit summary for a specific customer?
You can find the visit summary for a specific customer by searching for the customer name or ID in the 'Customer Visit Summary' section of the portal.
Can I access Mark visit details for previous months?
Yes, you can access Mark visit details for previous months by selecting the appropriate date range in the 'Mark Visit' report section.
